Title: xLite Player - Silverlight Media Player
Description: This is a media player written in Silverlight 3. It uses XML as it's data storage.  It includes searching, paging and ability to add title, thumbnail and description to each video.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

An easy to use and expand on medial player written in Silverlight. Current version is written in Silverlight 3. I hope to keep expanding on this in the future. Please look at the downloads page for the features of this view player. You can look at an example here http://www.xdevsoftware.com/xLitePlayer2Desc.aspx

Dontate Here: http://www.xdevsoftware.com/xLitePlayer2Desc.aspx
